pages.text: Do you want ot duplicate your ore more easier than the crusher? Enrichment Chamber will do that. It'll supports 3 types of upgrades: Speed, Energy, and Muffling
This powerfull machine not turn ores into dust, it can turn the Redstone Ore into 12 Redstone Dusts, 1 Nether Quartz Ore=> 6 Nether Quartzs, and many thing..
